HomeWiki:
Project Description
Being able to render and interact with webpages within WPF opens up some great opportunities. This project mixes Google’s Chromium project, a great wrapper called Awesomium and a little WPF pixie dust...

UPDATE - New version available for .NET 4.0 here: WPF 4.0 Chromium WebBrowser control

For more information see the related blog post here:

http://chriscavanagh.wordpress.com/2009/08/25/a-real-wpf-webbrowser/
